mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal_item (user_id, name, count, calories, protein, assumption, meal_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{count}, #{calories}, #{protein}, #{assumption}, #{mealDate})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, name, `count` as count, calories, protein, assumption, created_at as createdAt, meal_date as mealDate FROM meal_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND meal_date = #{mealDate} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(calories), 0) AS total_calories, COALESCE(SUM(protein), 0) AS total_protein FROM meal_item WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM meal_item WHERE user_id = #{userId} and id = #{itemId}
mapper.select: select * from meal_favorite where user_id = #{userId} order by sort_order, created_at asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal_favorite (id, name, user_id, protein, calories) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{userId}, #{protein}, #{calories})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM meal_favorite WHERE user_id = #{userId} and id = #{id}
